direct_log_api.batch_size.description: The number of logs included in a payload patch, sent to the submission endpoint

direct_log_api.bytes.description: The size of the payload sent to the direct log submission endpoint in bytes, regardless of success

direct_log_api.errors.description: The number of requests sent to the api endpoint that errored, tagged by the error type (e.g. Timeout, NetworkError, StatusCode)

direct_log_api.ms.description: The time it takes to send the payload sent to the endpoint in ms

direct_log_api.requests.description: The number of payloads sent to the endpoint

direct_log_api.responses.description: The number of responses received from the endpoint, tagged with status code

direct_log_logs.description: The number of logs sent to the direct log submission sink, tagged by IntegrationName. Includes only logs that were sent, not filtered logs

direct_log_queue.length.description: The number of logs currently enqueued to the direct log submission sink

instrumentations.description: The number of profiler instrumentations created, tagged by the component (e.g. `component_name:calltarget`, `component_name:calltarget_interfaces`)

native_init_time.description: Essentially all the stats values available from the native profiler. We may potentially want to include these in the 'common' init_time metric - I'm not sure?

public_api.description: The number of invocations of a given public API, tagged by the name of the api

unsupported_custom_instrumentation_servi.description: The number of services in which the customer has installed manual instrumentation that is greater than the automatic instrumentation (and so won't work)

version_conflict_tracers_created.description: The number of version-confict tracers created
